name: metro-tphcm-seed
description: Seed data cho hệ thống Metro TPHCM với 8 tuyến metro chính

scripts.seed:clean: node -e "const { Station, Route, RouteStation, Train } = require('../models'); Promise.all([Station.destroy({where:{}}), Route.destroy({where:{}}), RouteStation.destroy({where:{}}), Train.destroy({where:{}})])"

author: Metro TPHCM Development Team
